description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying a subject page. It includes a function for generating static parameters based on mock data and an async component that renders a SubjectPageClient component with a decoded subject ID.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static route parameters for all subjects based on mock data; used for static site generation in Next.js.

methods.name: SubjectPage
methods.description: Main React component fetching params, resolving them, and rendering the SubjectPageClient.
